TopicTitle: Kerbals at War - The very first KSP War movie

Articles.Content:
Here's a video I made - as far as I can tell there's no 'media' forum so I'm assuming stuff like this goes in general.

Playing the game how Harvester obviously intended.

Alternate names include Kerpocalypse now, Generation Kerbal, etc...

Mods used include Damned Aeropsace & Robotics, Kosmos, Kyle and Winston Pack, and Railguns and Modular missiles

I haven't really been going to space that much... Any Questions that aren't answered in the description I'll answer here. Enjoy!

Edited August 15, 2012 by Squeegy Mackoy
0_O I WANT MORE......MOARRRRRRRRR
This is just awesome. Good job!

That.... Ohmygosh.... You win. Take my money, my house, my everything That was all I need in life :\'(

*cough*

But though, that was excellent! Bravo!

Everyone is always like 'no combat is KSP!'.

Seriously... THIS IS SO MUCH MORE AWESOME THAN EVEN I THOUGHT COMBAT WOULD BE! (nice designs for everything).

P.S. How did you get everything to move autonomously? You make it look like this was done via multiplayer.
Absolutely incredible!! You guys all amaze me with your mad skillz.

Everyone is always like 'no combat is KSP!'.

Seriously... THIS IS SO MUCH MORE AWESOME THAN EVEN I THOUGHT COMBAT WOULD BE! (nice designs for everything).

P.S. How did you get everything to move autonomously? You make it look like this was done via multiplayer.

probably switching quickly useing the [ and ] keys
That was just epic. Nice work dude! 8)

Holy Spade! That. Was. GODLIKE.

1. How on Kerbin did you do that?

2. Can I haz all of dem .crafts?
Awesome! Your designs are impressive
I want

Uhhhhh wow... That was epic!

If this is just a hint of what multiplayer might be like. This will be the most awesome sandbox game since Gmod!
SO MUCH EPICNESS!!

Everyone is always like 'no combat is KSP!'.

Seriously... THIS IS SO MUCH MORE AWESOME THAN EVEN I THOUGHT COMBAT WOULD BE! (nice designs for everything).

P.S. How did you get everything to move autonomously? You make it look like this was done via multiplayer.

Come to think of it, a multiplayer wargame where you can put your machines together from parts would be amazing.

I\'m a pacifist, but THAT IS ONE OF THE BEST KSP MOVIES EVAR !!! Love the camera, effects and all !

BTW could you post the craft files ? The\'yre so awesome !

EDIT : Also, how did you do the 'fighter jet\'s fight' scene with planes battling against each other ? Was one plane launched from the other ?
I generally do not like the obsession some people have with militarizing KSP but this is by far the MOST EPIC THING I HAVE EVER SEEN! Awesome.

EDIT : Also, how did you do the 'fighter jet\'s fight' scene with planes battling against each other ? Was one plane launched from the other ?

I would guess that he made an aircraft that consists of the two planes shown in the video connected to each other, decoupled them in the air and then recorded the footage.

I would guess that he made an aircraft that consists of the two planes shown in the video connected to each other, decoupled them in the air and then recorded the footage.

That\'s what I meant when I said 'launching one from the other'. Anyway, the illusion is perfect !
That was amazing... I thought the hovercraft was the best! I should have a naval battle with you!
you my friend, win. YOU WIN SO AWESOMELY!!!!

This is really creative, especially the way you\'ve managed to make it seem like several things are being controlled at once.

Also, was there a hint of humor here? Not the missed shots, but i did laugh pretty loudly when the torpedo attack boat destroyed itself more than it\'s target.

And, old explosions? I suppose you\'ve either chosen not to update for a particular reason, or as i suspect, this has been a WIP for a good deal of time.

Ascensiam! With all this fighting, it\'s like RP on a standard day all over again!

Lol.

Ascensiam! With all this fighting, it\'s like RP on a standard day all over again!

Lol.

Exactly what I was thinking! Good \'ol days when everyone developed their own craft with a reason

But as awesome as the video is, it will only make more people ask for multiplayer... oh well.
Awesome, just plain awesome mate.
